Let's Have Fun Together Festival
22  February,  2024
Let's Have Fun Together Festival for social sports integration in partnership and cooperation Best Buddies-Qatar with Yarmouk Preparatory School and sponsorship of Qatar Sports Club
Note that the number of participants is 70 members of the Best Buddies-Qatar clubs for the preparatory stage for boys from seven schools and the Shafallah Center
.
The festival includes purposeful competitive entertainment and sports activities.
